articles.description: James Scott and Nick Masterson scored 20 points apiece and Kennesaw State beat Jacksonville 78-54 on Saturday, for its third straight win.
articles.headline: Scott, Masterson lead, Kennesaw St. beats Jacksonville 78-54

articles.description: Jamaal King scored 19 of his 25 points in the first half, Keith Braxton had 20 points and nine rebounds and St. Francis (Pa.) beat St. Francis (Brooklyn) 90-65 on Saturday.
articles.headline: St. Francis (Pa.) beats St. Francis (Brooklyn) 90-65

articles.description: RaySean Scott scored a career-high 21 points and Florida Gulf Coast became the first team in the country this season to clinch a league title, beating South Carolina Upstate 88-71 on Saturday.
articles.headline: FGCU clinches A-Sun title with 88-71 win over SC Upstate

articles.description: Thomas Wilder scored 19 points and Western Michigan defeated Ohio 69-60 on Saturday.
articles.headline: Wilder scores 19 in Western Michigan's 69-60 win over Ohio

articles.description: Marlain Veal scored six of his 20 points in the final seconds to help Southeastern Louisiana hold off McNeese for a 74-67 victory on Saturday.
articles.headline: Veal has 20 points as SE Louisiana holds off McNeese 74-67

articles.description: After VCU's Issac Vann knocks down a 3-pointer late in the first half, Jalen Crutcher heaves up a shot and gets it to go at the buzzer.
articles.headline: Dayton's Crutcher hits shot from beyond half court

images.caption: After VCU's Issac Vann knocks down a 3-pointer late in the first half, Jalen Crutcher heaves up a shot and gets it to go at the buzzer.
images.name: Dayton's Crutcher hits shot from beyond half court
